mapper.insert: insert into honey_badgers.cart (id, cust_id, quantity, unit_price, total_amt, kitchen_name, biz_name, menu_id) values (#{id}, #{custId}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{totalAmt}, #{kitchenName}, #{bizName}, #{menuId})
insert into honey_badgers.cart_detail (id, cart_id, menu_opt_id, menu_id, menu_opt_name, menu_opt_price) values (#{id}, #{cartId}, #{menuOptId}, #{menuId}, #{menuOptName}, #{menuOptPrice})
mapper.select: select CA.id cartId , CA.cust_id custId , CA.quantity quantity , CA.unit_price unitPrice , CA.total_amt totalAmount , CA.kitchen_name kitchenName , CA.biz_name bizName , CA.menu_id menuId , DE.id detId , DE.cart_id detCartId , DE.menu_opt_id optId , DE.menu_id detMenuId , DE.menu_opt_name optName , DE.menu_opt_price optPrice from honey_badgers.cart CA , honey_badgers.cart_detail DE where CA.cust_id = #{custId} and CA.id = DE.cart_id
mapper.update: update honey_badgers.cart set quantity = #{quantity}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, total_amt = #{totalAmt} where id = #{id}
